scripts.debug: npm run clean && npm install && mkdir Client/dist && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && mkdir Client/dist && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static: xcopy /s Client/src/styles/. Client/dist && xcopy Client/src/index.html Client/dist/index.html
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place Client/dist/index.html style.css style.min.css && place Client/dist/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babili Client/dist/main.js > Client/dist/main.min.js
